entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High minus 4.

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 9 with temperature rising to minus 6 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning before morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 9 with temperature rising to minus 6 by morning. Wind chill minus 14 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Rain. High 9.
entry.summary: Snow changing to ice pellets in the morning then to rain near noon. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High 9. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 09 February 2023
